detail_desc: Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Top in jersey crêpe with short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Cap in a cotton weave with concealed elastication at the back.
Short jersey skirt with an elasticated waist.

Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps that have a metal decoration at the front and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Joggers in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Trims in contrasting colour jersey around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset, lace trims and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.

Knee-length skirt in twill made from a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats, a soft, detachable, adjustable belt with a covered buckle, side pockets and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a viscose and linen weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Detachable ties at the waist, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. No fasteners. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Wide trousers in soft cotton denim with broderie anglaise. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, side pockets and 3/4-length legs with scalloped hems.
Metal hair clips. Length 5 cm.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, decorated in various ways. Adjustable length.
Short skirt in stretch viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, a gathered seam centre front at the top and a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Briefs in lace made from recycled nylon with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with an inset, V-shaped mesh section at the front, padded cups with removable inserts and narrow elastication at the hem. The polyester content of the sports top is recycled.
Bikini top with lightly padded, triangular cups, transparent sections and narrow ties that can be fastened in various ways. No fastening at the back.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes along the short sides.
Long, wide top in soft fleece with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Long dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, smocking at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Long, fitted skirt in lightweight jersey with a high, elasticated waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and at the crotch.
Long shirt in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Side pockets, a slightly lower crotch and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.
Short-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with elastication and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, patch front pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft slub-knit viscose blend with a lace trim at the hem and slits in the sides.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
T-shirt dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and straight hem.
Wide top in sturdy slub jersey with short, flounced sleeves.
Hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross over at the back.
Backpack in a woven fabric with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Width 25 cm. Height 34 cm.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with short, wide sleeves and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and ties at one side. Unlined.
Jacket in pattened sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with sewn-on ears. Zip at the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey T-shirt.

Shirt in soft, checked fleece with a collar lined in woven fabric and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Oversized shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with lacing at the sides, high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey in various designs with press-studs down the front that continue along one leg. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
A pair of large, pineapple-shaped metal earrings decorated with glass and plastic beads.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a deep neckline at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft merino wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, discreet side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Brushed inside.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with patches and a print motif at the top, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with a button fly wide loops with metal eyelets and studs at the front.
Trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Detachable, adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable, braided belt at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.
Double-breasted reefer jacket in soft, felted fabric with notch lapels, gold-coloured metal buttons, side pockets and a tab with a button at the cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length, bell-shaped skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist, pleats for added width, a concealed zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.

Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.
